price: 13 Et il fut, par Notre grâce, plein de tendresse et de vertu. Animé par la crainte de son Seigneur,
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
